BalanceChecker.Misc

Class UserModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BalanceChecker.Misc.UserModel

  • public class UserModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Class providing user related functions for authentication and balance status checks

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int id
      Internal unique identifier of the user.
      protected boolean initialized
      Flag indicating if user is initialized (data from file loaded to memory).
      protected boolean isAdmin
      Flag indicating if user have administrator permissions.
      protected boolean loggedIn
      Flag indicating if user is actually logged in.
      protected java.lang.String username
      Username (login) of the user.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Get id of current user.
        Returns:
        Identifier of the user

      • logIn

        public boolean logIn(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Perform log in operation. Loads state of the user from file. Checks username and password and if match, set loggedIn to true
        Parameters:
        username - Username (login) of the user
        password - Password of the user
        Returns:
        True if success, false if failed

      • logOut

        public final void logOut()
        Reset all variables to default value and logs out user from the system.

      • setIsLoggedIn

        public void setIsLoggedIn(boolean state)
        Set if user is logged in or not
        Parameters:
        state - True if logged in, else false

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Checks if user is logged in.
        Returns:
        True if logged in, else false

      • setIsAdmin

        public void setIsAdmin(boolean state)
        Set if user is an administrator or not
        Parameters:
        state - True if administrator, else false

      • isAdmin

        public boolean isAdmin()
        Checks if user have administrator permissions.
        Returns:
        True if user is admin, else false

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Seter for username field
        Parameters:
        username - Username of client

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Getter for username field
        Returns:
        Username

      • loadState

        protected boolean loadState(java.lang.String username)
        Load state of the user from file.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of user which state should be loaded
        Returns:
        True if loading was successful, if any error occured - false

      • getFilepathForUser

        protected java.lang.String getFilepathForUser()
        Returns path to the file with user state for current user
        Returns:
        Path to the file with user state

      • getFilepathForUser

        protected java.lang.String getFilepathForUser(java.lang.String username)
        Returns path to the file with user state
        Parameters:
        username - Username for which path should be generated
        Returns:
        Path to the file.

      • changeBalance

        protected boolean changeBalance(float ammount,
                                boolean godMode)
        Change account balance by given ammount of money.
        Parameters:
        ammount - Ammount of cash. If godMode is false, only negative values are allowed.
        godMode - Allows to "create" money (ammount more than 0). Default false, true only admin's and loading from file
        Returns:
        True if all was ok, else false

      • changeBalance

        protected boolean changeBalance(float ammount)
        The same as changebalance(float, boolean=false)
        Parameters:
        ammount - Ammount of money to change balance
        Returns:
        True if success, else false

      • reloadBalance

        protected boolean reloadBalance()
        Refresh internal state of account balance.
        Returns:
        True if reload is ok, else false

      • resetBalance

        protected void resetBalance()
        Set balance to Not a number value to indicate that balance is not initialized.

      • getBalance

        public java.lang.Float getBalance()
        Getter for balance field
        Returns:
        Balance of user account

      • setBalance

        public void setBalance(float balance)
        Set balance to given state
        Parameters:
        balance - Balance to which account should be set

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(java.lang.String ammount)
        Withdraw ammount of money from account
        Parameters:
        ammount - Ammount of money
        Returns:
        True if success, else false

      • createUser

        public boolean createUser(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
        Method creating new user and assiging default values to member fields
        Parameters:
        username - Username for new user
        password - Password for new user
        Returns:
        True if success, else false

      • checkUserBalance

        public java.lang.Float checkUserBalance(java.lang.String username)
        Method returning balance for user with given username
        Parameters:
        username - Username of user which balance should be checked
        Returns:
        User balance if success, Float.NaN if user not found or any error occured

      • changeUserBalance

        public java.lang.Float changeUserBalance(java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String ammount)
        Change balance for given user by ammount of money
        Parameters:
        username - Username for which balance should be changed
        ammount - Ammount of money that should be added/removed from account
        Returns:
        New user balance or Float.NaN if any errors occured
